name: The Cartoon Kitchen: Braised Pork Chops
description: This week's Cartoon Kitchen features Serious Eats' cartoonist in residence Larry Gonick's spin on braised pork. —Ed Levine...
recipeIngredient:
• Pork chops
  • Garlic
  • Rosemary
  • Flour
  • Salt and pepper
  • Olive oil
  • Beef or chicken broth
  • Green onions
  • Diced carrot
  • Bay leaf

recipeInstructions.text:
1. Rub pork chops with garlic and rosemay; dredge in salted and peppered flour.
  2. Heat olive oil in a heavy pan over medium-high heat; brown chops well on both sides.
  3. Add beef or chicken broth to a depth of 1 inch. Add a couple green onions, a diced carrot, a bay leaf. Cover, and simmer for 20 to 30 minutes, turning chops now and then, and adding liquid as needed.
